title: President congratulates Dr Masoud Pezeshkian on his election as President of Iran
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 06 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Saturday extended his heartfelt congratulations to Dr Masoud Pezeshkian on his election as the President of Iran.
Pakistan and Iran enjoy fraternal ties and I hope that under your leadership our relations will grow further stronger, the president said in a statement.
He expressed his eagerness to work together for the peace and prosperity of the region.
